author: FourFourTwo
description: Cristiano Ronaldo scored a double against Celta Vigo to continue his fine form, leaving fellow Real Madrid star Isco signing his praises.
title: Isco: Very easy to play with on-fire Cristiano Ronaldo

author: FourFourTwo
description: Cristiano Ronaldo is in "very good nick" and that is pleasing Real Madrid coach Zinedine Zidane.
title: He's in very good nick – Zidane delighted with Ronaldo

author: FourFourTwo
description: Cristiano Ronaldo will take part for Real Madrid against Celta Vigo on Wednesday, having been rested in recent weeks.
title: Ronaldo will not be rested for Real Madrid v Celta

author: FourFourTwo
description: Zinedine Zidane is on the brink of his first league title as a coach and Cristiano Ronaldo believes the Frenchman has done very well.
title: Ronaldo salutes Zidane's management as Madrid close on LaLiga crown

author: FourFourTwo
description: Carles Puyol has nothing but respect for Cristiano Ronaldo, but prefers former Barcelona team-mate Lionel Messi over the Real Madrid man.
title: Puyol: Ronaldo an all-time great, but Messi better

author: talkSPORT
description: Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice at Celta Vigo to ensure Real Madrid need just a point from their weekend game at Malaga to win the LaLiga title for the first time in five years. Ronaldo, who in reaching 368 league goals for a top European club overtook Jimmy Greaves in the all-time scorers list, struck early in each half as Real held Celta at arm's length to claim a 4-1 victory.
title: VIDEO: Celta Vigo 1-4 Real Madrid: Cristiano Ronaldo bags brace to take step closer to LaLiga glory

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Inter director Piero Ausilio insists Suning “could comfortably buy Cristiano Ronaldo, but can’t because of Financial Fair Play. Gabigol? I can’t explain that…”
title: Ausilio: 'Inter could buy Ronaldo...'

author: FourFourTwo
description: Jimmy Greaves' 46-year reign as the most prolific player from Europe's top five leagues is over after Cristiano Ronaldo scored a 367th goal.
title: Ronaldo surpasses Greaves to become the all-time leading scorer across Europe's top five leagues

author: FourFourTwo
description: Real Madrid moved to within a point of securing the league title after Cristiano Ronaldo inspired a 4-1 win at Celta Vigo.
title: Celta Vigo 1 Real Madrid 4: Ronaldo double helps Zidane's men to within a point of LaLiga title

author: talkSPORT
description: Cristiano Ronaldo has set yet another new record. The Real Madrid forward surpassed Jimmy Greaves' tally of 366 goals in Europe's top five leagues, netting his 367th and 368th in a 4-1 win over Celta Vigo in La Liga on Wednesday night. Record aside though, plenty remain split between determining who is the better player: Lionel Messi or Cristiano Ronaldo. While comparisons distract from the spectacle of watching two of the greatest ever footballers in action, we couldn't help but see how the two compare in front of goal in recent years.
title: Messi v Ronaldo: How the Barcelona and Real Madrid stars' club goal records compare, season-by-season
